plot_funcs¶

optimal_covering.plot_funcs.plot_best_fitnesses(best_fitnesses)¶

Makes a plot of the best fitnesses seen during each iteration of the genetic algorithm. Currently just a basic matplotlib plot.

optimal_covering.plot_funcs.plot_clear(dtime, show=True)¶

Plot an orthographic projection of clear area.

  • dtime = datetime instance

  • show = boolean: whether or not to display a plot

Either shows a plot and returns nothing, or returns the axis on which the clear area is plotted, depending on the value of “show”.
